Texts.Eng: The most harrowing time for the X'ian people came soon after. According to texts there are accounts that speak of invaders or visitors from 'elsewhere' that interrupted their progress through literal planetary upheaval and forced terraforming. While none of the records name this race speculation is high that it could have been the Anodyne due in part to their description being a close match. This is now, sadly, rumor pulled from antiquated records...at best.
